laboratory_examinations.findings: Lymphocyte count rose to 300,000 per cubic millimeter.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Lymphocyte count increased during the interval from 30 to 34 months after gene therapy.

laboratory_examinations.findings: One proviral integration site was found on the short arm of chromosome 11 within the LMO-2 locus.

laboratory_examinations.date: Between 30 and 34 months after gene therapy
laboratory_examinations.findings: Presence of t(6;13) translocation, which had not been detected 30 months after therapy.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: New finding of t(6;13) translocation developed between evaluations.
